00039 /*
00040  * Idea is that final implementation will fallback to calling these methods
00041  * on port object, but this is currently not of high priority and tedious 
00042  * to get right. So these selectors are currently unused and port operations 
00043  * on non-port object fail unconditionally.
00044  */
00045 
00046 dfsch_type_t dfsch_port_type = {
00047   DFSCH_ABSTRACT_TYPE,
00048   NULL,
00049   0,
00050   "port",
00051   NULL,
00052   NULL,
00053   NULL
00054 };
00055 
00056 dfsch_type_t dfsch_port_type_type = {
00057   DFSCH_META_TYPE,
00058   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00059   sizeof(dfsch_port_type_t),
00060   "port-type",
00061   NULL,
00062   NULL,
00063   NULL
00064 };
00065 
00066 int dfsch_port_p(dfsch_object_t* port){
00067   return DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE;
00068 }
00069 int dfsch_output_port_p(dfsch_object_t* port){
00070   return DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE &&
00071     ((dfsch_port_type_t*)DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port))->write_buf;
00072 }
00073 int dfsch_input_port_p(dfsch_object_t* port){
00074   return DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE &&
00075     ((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->read_buf;
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 void dfsch_port_write_buf(dfsch_object_t* port, char*buf, size_t size){
00080   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE){
00081     if (((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->write_buf){
00082       ((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->write_buf(port, buf, size);
00083     } else {
00084       dfsch_error("Not an output port", port);
00085     }
00086   } else {
00087     dfsch_error("Not a port", port);
00088   }
00089 }
00090 void dfsch_port_write_cstr(dfsch_object_t* port, char*str){
00091   dfsch_port_write_buf(port, str, strlen(str));
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 ssize_t dfsch_port_read_buf(dfsch_object_t* port, char*buf, size_t size){
00096   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE){
00097     if (((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->read_buf){
00098       return ((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->read_buf(port, 
00099                                                                    buf, size);
00100     } else {
00101       dfsch_error("Not an input port", port);
00102     }
00103   } else {
00104     dfsch_error("Not a port", port);
00105   }
00106 }
00107 
00108 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_port_read_whole(dfsch_object_t* port){
00109   ssize_t ret;
00110   char* buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(1024);
00111   str_list_t* sl = sl_create();
00112   while ((ret = dfsch_port_read_buf(port, buf, 1024))){
00113     sl_nappend(sl, buf, ret);
00114     buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(1024);
00115   }
00116   return sl_value_strbuf(sl);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void dfsch_port_seek(dfsch_object_t* port, int64_t offset, int whence){
00120   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE){
00121     if (((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->seek){
00122       ((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->seek(port, offset, whence);
00123     } else {
00124       dfsch_error("Port is not seekable", port);
00125     }
00126   } else {
00127     dfsch_error("Not a port", port);
00128   }
00129 }
00130 int64_t dfsch_port_tell(dfsch_object_t* port){
00131   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE){
00132     if (((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->tell){
00133       return ((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->tell(port);
00134     } else {
00135       return -1;
00136     }
00137   } else {
00138     dfsch_error("Not a port", port);
00139   }
00140 }
00141 
00142 void dfsch_port_batch_read_start(dfsch_object_t* port){
00143   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE){
00144     if (((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->batch_read_start){
00145       ((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->batch_read_start(port);
00146     }
00147   } else {
00148     dfsch_error("Not a port", port);
00149   }
00150 }
00151 void dfsch_port_batch_read_end(dfsch_object_t* port){
00152   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE){
00153     if (((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->batch_read_end){
00154       ((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->batch_read_end(port);
00155     }
00156   } else {
00157     dfsch_error("Not a port", port);
00158   }
00159 }
00160 int dfsch_port_batch_read(dfsch_object_t* port){
00161   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)->type == DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE){
00162     if (((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->batch_read){
00163       return ((dfsch_port_type_t*)(DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port)))->batch_read(port);
00164     } else {
00165       char buf;
00166       if (dfsch_port_read_buf(port, &buf, 1) != 1){
00167         return -1;
00168       } else {
00169         return buf;
00170       }
00171     }
00172   } else {
00173     dfsch_error("Not a port", port);
00174   }
00175 }
00176 
00177 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_port_readline(dfsch_object_t* port){
00178   int ch;
00179   char* buf;
00180   size_t buflen;
00181   size_t len;
00182 
00183   buflen = 128;
00184   len = 0;
00185   buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(buflen);
00186 
00187   dfsch_port_batch_read_start(port);
00188   DFSCH_UNWIND {
00189     while (1){
00190       ch = dfsch_port_batch_read(port);
00191       if (ch == -1){
00192         break;
00193       }
00194 
00195       if (buflen <= len){
00196         buflen *= 2;
00197         buf = GC_REALLOC(buf, buflen);
00198       }
00199 
00200       buf[len] = ch;
00201       len++;
00202 
00203       if (ch == '\n'){
00204         break;
00205       }
00206     }
00207   } DFSCH_PROTECT {
00208     dfsch_port_batch_read_end(port);
00209   } DFSCH_PROTECT_END;
00210 
00211   if (len == 0){
00212     return NULL;
00213   }
00214 
00215   return dfsch_strbuf_create(buf, len);
00216 }

00261 }

00263                                   char*buf, size_t len){

00265 }

00296 /*
00297  * current-foo-port implementation
00298  */
00299 
00300 /*
00301  * TODO: It's actually not bad idea to have this structure thread-specific
00302  * (it's more or less required for reliable operation) but this suffices
00303  * as current implementation.
00304  */
00305 
00306 typedef struct current_ports_t{
00307   dfsch_object_t* output_port;
00308   dfsch_object_t* input_port;
00309   dfsch_object_t* error_port;
00310 } current_ports_t;
00311 
00312 current_ports_t* current_ports(){
00313   static current_ports_t p = {&null_port, &null_port, &null_port};
00314   return &p;
00315 }
00316 
00317 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_current_output_port(){
00318   return current_ports()->output_port;
00319 }
00320 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_current_input_port(){
00321   return current_ports()->input_port;
00322 }
00323 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_current_error_port(){
00324   return current_ports()->error_port;
00325 }
00326 
00327 void dfsch_set_current_output_port(dfsch_object_t* port){
00328   if (!dfsch_output_port_p(port)){
00329     dfsch_error("Not an output port", port);
00330   }
00331   current_ports()->output_port = port;
00332 }
00333 void dfsch_set_current_input_port(dfsch_object_t* port){
00334   if (!dfsch_input_port_p(port)){
00335     dfsch_error("Not an input port", port);
00336   }
00337   current_ports()->input_port = port;  
00338 }
00339 void dfsch_set_current_error_port(dfsch_object_t* port){
00340   if (!dfsch_output_port_p(port)){
00341     dfsch_error("Not an output port", port);
00342   }
00343   current_ports()->error_port = port;
00344 }

00346 /*
00347  * string-output-port
00348  */
00349 
00350 typedef struct string_output_port_t {
00351   dfsch_type_t* type;
00352   str_list_t* list;
00353   pthread_mutex_t* mutex;
00354 } string_output_port_t;
00355 
00356 
00357 static void string_output_port_write_buf(string_output_port_t* port, 
00358                                char*buf, size_t len){
00359   pthread_mutex_lock(port->mutex);
00360   sl_nappend(port->list, buf, len);
00361   pthread_mutex_unlock(port->mutex);
00362 }
00363 
00364 dfsch_port_type_t dfsch_string_output_port_type = {
00365   {
00366     DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE,
00367     DFSCH_PORT_TYPE,
00368     sizeof(string_output_port_t),
00369     "string-output-port",
00370     NULL,
00371     NULL,
00372     NULL,
00373     NULL,
00374     
00375     NULL,
00376     "Output only port backed by string"
00377   },
00378   (dfsch_port_write_buf_t)string_output_port_write_buf,
00379   NULL,
00380 
00381   NULL,
00382   NULL,
00383 
00384   NULL,
00385   NULL,
00386   NULL
00387 };
00388 
00389 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_string_output_port(){
00390   string_output_port_t* port = 
00391     (string_output_port_t*)dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_STRING_OUTPUT_PORT_TYPE);
00392 
00393   port->mutex = create_finalized_mutex();
00394   port->list = sl_create();
00395 
00396   return (dfsch_object_t*)port;
00397 }
00398 dfsch_strbuf_t* dfsch_string_output_port_value(dfsch_object_t* port){
00399   string_output_port_t* p;
00400   dfsch_strbuf_t* buf;
00401 
00402   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(port) != DFSCH_STRING_OUTPUT_PORT_TYPE){
00403     dfsch_error("exceptiion:not-a-string-output-port", port);
00404   }
00405   p = (string_output_port_t*) port;
00406 
00407   pthread_mutex_lock(p->mutex);
00408   buf = sl_value_strbuf(p->list);
00409   pthread_mutex_unlock(p->mutex);
00410   
00411   return buf;
00412 }
00413 
00414 /*
00415  * string-input-port
00416  */
00417 
00418 typedef struct string_input_port_t {
00419   dfsch_type_t* type;
00420   size_t len;
00421   size_t cur;
00422   char* buf;
00423   pthread_mutex_t* mutex;
00424 } string_input_port_t;
00425 
00426 static ssize_t string_input_port_read_buf(string_input_port_t* port,
00427                                           char* buf, size_t len){
00428   size_t rlen;
00429 
00430   pthread_mutex_lock(port->mutex);
00431   
00432   if (port->len < len + port->cur){
00433     len = port->len - port->cur;
00434   }
00435 
00436   memcpy(buf, port->buf + port->cur, len);
00437   port->cur += len;
00438 
00439   pthread_mutex_unlock(port->mutex);
00440 
00441   return len;
00442 }
00443 
00444 dfsch_port_type_t dfsch_string_input_port_type = {
00445   {
00446     DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE,
00447     DFSCH_PORT_TYPE,
00448     sizeof(string_input_port_t),
00449     "string-input-port",
00450     NULL,
00451     NULL,
00452     NULL,
00453     NULL,
00454 
00455     NULL,
00456     "Input-only port backed by string"
00457   },
00458   NULL,
00459   (dfsch_port_read_buf_t)string_input_port_read_buf,
00460 
00461   NULL,
00462   NULL,
00463 
00464   NULL, // TODO
00465   NULL,
00466   NULL
00467 };
00468 
00469 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_string_input_port(char* buf, size_t len){
00470   string_input_port_t* port = 
00471     (string_input_port_t*)dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_STRING_INPUT_PORT_TYPE);
00472 
00473   port->buf = buf;
00474   port->len = len;
00475   port->cur = 0;
00476   port->mutex = create_finalized_mutex();
00477 
00478   return (dfsch_object_t*)port;
00479 }
00480 
00481 /*
00482  * file-port - port based on stdio FILE*
00483  *
00484  * This port is somehow special, because it's both input-port? and output-port?
00485  * but whenever it's usable for input, output or both directions depends on 
00486  * flags used when opening.
00487  */
00488 
00489 typedef struct file_port_t {
00490   dfsch_type_t* type;
00491   FILE* file;
00492   int close;
00493   int open;
00494   char* name;
00495 } file_port_t;
00496 
00497 
00498 static void errno_error(char* name, dfsch_object_t* object, int e){
00499   dfsch_error(name, dfsch_list(3, 
00500                                object,
00501                                dfsch_make_number_from_long(e),
00502                                dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(e))));
00503 }
00504 
00505 static void file_port_write_buf(file_port_t* port, 
00506                                 char*buf, size_t len){
00507   size_t ret;
00508 
00509   if (!port->open){
00510     dfsch_error("Port is closed", port);
00511   }
00512 
00513   if (len != 0){
00514     ret = fwrite(buf, len, 1, port->file);
00515     if (ret == 0){
00516       dfsch_operating_system_error("fwrite");    
00517     }
00518   }
00519 }
00520 static ssize_t file_port_read_buf(file_port_t* port,
00521                                   char* buf, size_t len){
00522   size_t ret;
00523 
00524   if (!port->open){
00525     dfsch_error("Port is closed", port);
00526   }
00527 
00528   ret = fread(buf, 1, len, port->file);
00529   if (ret == 0){
00530     if (feof(port->file)){
00531       return 0;
00532     } else {
00533       dfsch_operating_system_error("fread");    
00534     }
00535   }
00536   return ret;
00537 }
00538 static void file_port_write(file_port_t* port, dfsch_writer_state_t* state){
00539   if (port->open){
00540     if (port->name){
00541       dfsch_write_unreadable(state, port, 
00542                              "name %s fd %d", 
00543                              port->name,
00544                              fileno(port->file));
00545     } else {
00546       dfsch_write_unreadable(state, port, "fd %d", fileno(port->file));
00547     }
00548   } else {
00549     dfsch_write_unreadable(state, port, "*closed*");
00550   }
00551 }
00552 
00553 static void file_port_seek(file_port_t* port, int64_t offset, int whence){
00554   if (!port->open){
00555     dfsch_error("exception:port-closed", port);
00556   }
00557 
00558   if (fseek(port->file, offset, whence) != 0){
00559     dfsch_operating_system_error("fseek");    
00560   }
00561 }
00562 
00563 static int64_t file_port_tell(file_port_t* port){
00564   off_t ret;
00565   if (!port->open){
00566     dfsch_error("exception:port-closed", port);
00567   }
00568 
00569   ret = ftell(port->file);
00570 
00571   if (ret == -1){
00572     dfsch_operating_system_error("ftell");    
00573   }
00574 
00575   return ret;
00576 }
00577 
00578 static dfsch_slot_t file_port_slots[] = {
00579   DFSCH_STRING_SLOT(file_port_t, name, DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RO,
00580                     "Filename associated to port"),
00581   DFSCH_BOOLEAN_SLOT(file_port_t, open, DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RO,
00582                      "Is port open for accesses?"),
00583   DFSCH_BOOLEAN_SLOT(file_port_t, close, DFSCH_SLOT_ACCESS_RO,
00584                      "Will port be automatically closed by GC?"),
00585   DFSCH_SLOT_TERMINATOR,
00586 };
00587 
00588 dfsch_port_type_t dfsch_file_port_type = {
00589   {
00590     DFSCH_PORT_TYPE_TYPE,
00591     DFSCH_PORT_TYPE,
00592     sizeof(file_port_t),
00593     "file-port",
00594     NULL,
00595     (dfsch_type_write_t)file_port_write,
00596     NULL,
00597     NULL,
00598     
00599     &file_port_slots,
00600     
00601     "port backed by stdio stream"
00602   },
00603   (dfsch_port_write_buf_t)file_port_write_buf,
00604   (dfsch_port_read_buf_t)file_port_read_buf,
00605 
00606   (dfsch_port_seek_t)file_port_seek,
00607   (dfsch_port_tell_t)file_port_tell,
00608 
00609   NULL, // TODO
00610   NULL,
00611   NULL
00612 };
00613 
00614 static void file_port_finalizer(file_port_t* port, void* cd){
00615   if (port->open && port->close){
00616     fclose(port->file);
00617     port->open = 0;
00618   }
00619 }
00620 
00621 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_make_file_port(FILE* file, int close, char* name){
00622   file_port_t* port = (file_port_t*)dfsch_make_object(DFSCH_FILE_PORT_TYPE);
00623 
00624   port->file = file;
00625   port->close = close;
00626   port->name = name;
00627   port->open = 1; /* Creating closed ports makes no sense */
00628 
00629   if (close){
00630     GC_REGISTER_FINALIZER(port, (GC_finalization_proc)file_port_finalizer,
00631                           NULL, NULL, NULL);
00632   }
00633 
00634   return (dfsch_object_t*)port;
00635 }
00636 
00637 DFSCH_OBJECT_CACHE(dfsch_make_file_port(stdin, 0, "(standard input)"), 
00638                    dfsch_standard_input_port);
00639 DFSCH_OBJECT_CACHE(dfsch_make_file_port(stdout, 0, "(standard output)"), 
00640                    dfsch_standard_output_port);
00641 DFSCH_OBJECT_CACHE(dfsch_make_file_port(stderr, 0, "(standard error)"), 
00642                    dfsch_standard_error_port);
00643 
00644 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_open_file_port(char* filename, char* mode){
00645   FILE* file;
00646 
00647   if (mode[0] != 'r' && mode[0] != 'w' && mode[0] != 'a'){ 
00648     dfsch_error("Invalid file port mode", 
00649                 dfsch_make_string_cstr(mode));
00650   }
00651   if (mode[1] != 0){
00652     if (mode[1] != '+' && mode[1] != 'b'){
00653       dfsch_error("Invalid file port mode", 
00654                   dfsch_make_string_cstr(mode));
00655       
00656     }
00657     if (mode[2] != 0){
00658       if ((mode[2] != '+' && mode[2] != 'b') 
00659           || (mode[2] == mode[1])
00660           || (mode[3] != 0)){
00661         dfsch_error("Invalid file port mode", 
00662                     dfsch_make_string_cstr(mode));
00663       }
00664     }
00665   }
00666 
00667   file = fopen(filename, mode);
00668   
00669   if (!file){
00670       dfsch_operating_system_error("fopen");    
00671   }
00672 
00673   return dfsch_make_file_port(file, 1, filename);
00674 }
00675 
00676 void dfsch_close_file_port(dfsch_object_t* port){
00677   file_port_t* p = DFSCH_ASSERT_INSTANCE(port, DFSCH_FILE_PORT_TYPE);
00678 
00679   p = (file_port_t*) port;
00680 
00681   if (p->close && p->open){
00682     fclose(p->file);
00683     p->open = 0;
00684   }  
00685 }
00686 
00687 /*
00688  * Scheme interface
00689  */

00742 static dfsch_object_t* native_write(void* baton,
00743                                     dfsch_object_t* args,
00744                                     dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00745   dfsch_object_t* port;
00746   dfsch_object_t* object;
00747   char *buf;
00748   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, object);
00749   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, port, dfsch_current_output_port());  
00750   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00751 
00752   buf = dfsch_object_2_string(object, 1000, 1);
00753   dfsch_port_write_buf(port, buf, strlen(buf));
00754   
00755   return NULL;
00756 }

00758                                       dfsch_object_t* args,
00759                                       dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){

00764   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, port, dfsch_current_output_port());  
00765   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00766 
00767   buf = dfsch_object_2_string(object, 1000, 0);
00768   dfsch_port_write_buf(port, buf, strlen(buf));
00769   
00770   return NULL;
00771 }

00778   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00779 
00780   dfsch_port_write_buf(port, "\n", 1);
00781   
00782   return NULL;

00785 static dfsch_object_t* native_read(void* baton,
00786                                    dfsch_object_t* args,
00787                                    dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00788   dfsch_object_t* port;
00789   char *buf;
00790   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, port, dfsch_current_input_port());  
00791   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00792 
00793   return dfsch_parser_read_from_port(port);
00794 }
00795 
00796 static dfsch_object_t* native_port_read_buf(void* baton,
00797                                             dfsch_object_t* args,
00798                                             dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00799   dfsch_object_t* port;
00800   size_t len;
00801   char* buf;
00802   DFSCH_LONG_ARG(args, len);
00803   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, port, dfsch_current_input_port());  
00804   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00805 
00806   buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(len);
00807   len = dfsch_port_read_buf(port, buf, len);
00808   
00809   if (len == 0){
00810     return NULL;
00811   }
00812 
00813   return dfsch_make_string_buf(buf, len);
00814 }
00815 
00816 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(port_read_whole, 0){
00817   dfsch_object_t* port;
00818   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, port);
00819   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00820   return dfsch_make_string_strbuf(dfsch_port_read_whole(port));
00821 }

00823 static dfsch_object_t* native_port_read_line(void* baton,
00824                                              dfsch_object_t* args,
00825                                              dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00826   dfsch_object_t* port;
00827   dfsch_strbuf_t* buf;
00828   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, port, dfsch_current_input_port());  
00829   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00830 
00831   buf = dfsch_port_readline(port);
00832   if (!buf){
00833     return NULL;
00834   }
00835 
00836   return dfsch_make_string_strbuf(buf);
00837 }

00839 static dfsch_object_t* native_port_write_buf(void* baton,
00840                                              dfsch_object_t* args,
00841                                              dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00842   dfsch_object_t* port;
00843   dfsch_strbuf_t* buf;
00844   DFSCH_BUFFER_ARG(args, buf);
00845   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, port, dfsch_current_input_port());  
00846   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00847 
00848   dfsch_port_write_buf(port, buf->ptr, buf->len);
00849 
00850   return NULL;
00851 }
00852 static dfsch_object_t* native_port_seek(void* baton,
00853                                         dfsch_object_t* args,
00854                                         dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00855   dfsch_object_t* port;
00856   int64_t offset;
00857   int whence = SEEK_SET;
00858   
00859   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, port);
00860   DFSCH_INT64_ARG(args, offset);
00861   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN_ONE_OPT(args, whence);
00862   DFSCH_FLAG_VALUE("set", SEEK_SET, whence);
00863   DFSCH_FLAG_VALUE("cur", SEEK_CUR, whence);
00864   DFSCH_FLAG_VALUE("end", SEEK_END, whence);
00865   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args);
00866 
00867   dfsch_port_seek(port, offset, whence);
00868 
00869   return NULL;
00870 }
00871 static dfsch_object_t* native_port_tell(void* baton,
00872                                         dfsch_object_t* args,
00873                                         dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00874   dfsch_object_t* port;
00875   char *buf;
00876   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, port);  
00877   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00878   
00879   return dfsch_make_number_from_long(dfsch_port_tell(port));
00880 }

00937 
00938 void dfsch__port_native_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00939   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<port>", DFSCH_PORT_TYPE);
00940   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<null-port>", DFSCH_NULL_PORT_TYPE);
00941   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<file-port>", DFSCH_FILE_PORT_TYPE);
00942   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<string-input-port>", DFSCH_STRING_INPUT_PORT_TYPE);
00943   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<string-output-port>", DFSCH_STRING_OUTPUT_PORT_TYPE);
00944   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "<eof-object>", DFSCH_EOF_OBJECT_TYPE);
00945 
00946   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "current-output-port", 
00947                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_current_output_port, NULL));
00948   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "current-input-port", 
00949                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_current_input_port, NULL));
00950   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "current-error-port", 
00951                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_current_error_port, NULL));
00952   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "null-port", 
00953                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_null_port, NULL));
00954   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "write", 
00955                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_write, NULL));
00956   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "display", 
00957                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_display, NULL));
00958   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "newline", 
00959                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_newline, NULL));
00960   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "read", 
00961                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_read, NULL));
00962 
00963   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "eof-object?", 
00964                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_eof_object_p, NULL));
00965 
00966   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "port-write-buf", 
00967                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_port_write_buf, NULL));
00968   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "port-read-buf", 
00969                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_port_read_buf, NULL));
00970   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "port-read-whole", 
00971                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(port_read_whole));
00972   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "port-read-line", 
00973                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_port_read_line, NULL));
00974   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "port-seek!", 
00975                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_port_seek, NULL));
00976   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "port-tell", 
00977                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_port_tell, NULL));
00978 
00979   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "string-output-port", 
00980                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_string_output_port, NULL));
00981   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "string-output-port-value", 
00982                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_string_output_port_value,
00983                                          NULL));
00984   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "string-input-port", 
00985                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_string_input_port, NULL));
00986 
00987 }
00988 void dfsch_port_unsafe_register(dfsch_object_t* ctx){
00989   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "set-current-output-port!", 
00990                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_set_current_output_port, NULL));
00991   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "set-current-input-port!", 
00992                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_set_current_input_port, NULL));
00993   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "set-current-error-port!", 
00994                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_set_current_error_port, NULL));
00995   
00996   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "open-file-port", 
00997                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_open_file_port, NULL));
00998   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "close-file-port!", 
00999                     dfsch_make_primitive(native_close_file_port, NULL));
01000 
01001   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "*standard-input-port*",
01002                     dfsch_standard_input_port());
01003   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "*standard-output-port*",
01004                     dfsch_standard_output_port());
01005   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "*standard-error-port*",
01006                     dfsch_standard_error_port());
01007   
01008 
01009 }
